zodiac.name: Aries
zodiac.horoscope: You may be hypersensitive to change, because things have always been like this -- even when they weren't.  Maybe you're worried about potential sacrifices, and that could turn you into a dictator. Needless to say, this kind of nervousness is unusual for you. Use this day to reevaluate where you stand. You may be positioned in a very different place from where you thought you were. What's good is that you can move in any direction from here. Consider the possibilities, take a deep breath and take your first step.

zodiac.name: Taurus
zodiac.horoscope: Be yourself, by all means, but be sure to make yourself understood, too. Make it clear to others that you know what's what. Just don't make any further demands or plans today. Your past efforts are finally shifting into gear, so stand back and let them do their stuff. This is the time for appreciating the method to your madness and assuming everything will be OK. It's also a good networking moment if you're not too pushy. You're surrounded by people who could be very useful very soon. Be sure they know a little something about you.

Abrupt changes will probably make you uneasy. So will lack of change, for that matter. You're looking everywhere and you can't stop, even if you don't know what you're seeking or why. Today, you're just one big worrywart. This kind of tension isn't good for you. Concrete proof would be nice, but don't wait for it to turn up. There must be something else you can do to take your mind off your troubles. If you could forget for long enough, maybe you could leave this whole thing unresolved and just move on. It's worth considering.
zodiac.name: Gemini
Cancer
zodiac.horoscope: elcome to a day of balanced energy. Manifest your favorite reality, and feel free to get lost in the fine points. If you're going to all the trouble of making your own world, you deserve to enjoy every little detail. But don't ignore others as you wander through the richness of personal creation. They're not going to let you bail out of your responsibilities. Not that you were planning to flake, were you? That would upset the balance that's letting you take this mental vacation. It's about dancing to the music and paying the piper. Just keep everything in harmony, OK?

zodiac.name: Leo
zodiac.horoscope: Ordinarily, you want and expect royal treatment from everyone -- your friends, coworkers and strangers alike. But not today. At the moment, justice appeals equally to your senses of logic and balance. This is a good time to even things up, so hit the gym or the trail, eat balanced meals, and take a good look at your bank account. There may be some outstanding charges that need to be worked into your budget. Soon you can get back to the lush life you so love living, but for now, pay attention to these details.

zodiac.name: Virgo
zodiac.horoscope: You have an instinct for accuracy and a drive for honesty. Your wholesome world view includes a certain down-to-grit, because after all that's what the world is made of. Little details and obvious truths motivate you to speak up and reach out. Be completely businesslike today. Whether you or someone else launches this thing, ride it to a profitable conclusion. Use all your best qualities like accuracy, honesty and diligence. Live up to your full potential.

zodiac.name: Libra
zodiac.horoscope: Good little worker bees will finish outstanding projects today. But what if yours isn't 'outstanding'? That's just fine. As long as you've put your best effort into it, you know you can stand by your work, no matter what anyone else might have to say about it. Tap into your natural creativity, and your output will be even stronger. Best of all, you still like what you do, regardless of whether it's museum-quality. How many people can claim that? Most of us aren't nearly so self-accepting, and the fact that you are is a real gift.

zodiac.name: Scorpio
zodiac.horoscope: Good little worker bees will finish outstanding projects today. But what if yours isn't 'outstanding'? That's just fine. As long as you've put your best effort into it, you know you can stand by your work, no matter what anyone else might have to say about it. Tap into your natural creativity, and your output will be even stronger. Best of all, you still like what you do, regardless of whether it's museum-quality. How many people can claim that? Most of us aren't nearly so self-accepting, and the fact that you are is a real gift.

zodiac.name: Sagittarius
zodiac.horoscope: You have a high opinion of your efforts. Nobody's denying you the right to self-esteem, but how does all this interface with your on-the-ground reality? That's the real question. You might be easily annoyed if concept and execution don't quite match up today. Oh, come on. Do you really want to be the person who picks a fight over every little thing? Of course not. Nobody aspires to a reputation like that. Your only way out of this mess will be dealing with what is instead of what you think should be.

zodiac.name: Capricorn
zodiac.horoscope: Don't complain about what you can't change, because you probably actually can change it. And don't spend today playing politics or trying to score extra points. There's an even better way to move yourself along: Just do your job and do it well. Push and stretch further than you usually do, and leave no stone unturned. You can accomplish great things if you use your natural talents, and you're smart enough to know that if it's worth doing, it's worth doing well. Best of all, you're savvy enough to know how to do all the right things.`

zodiac.name: Aquarius
zodiac.horoscope: It's your system and you can always take your business elsewhere. It's your ball and therefore the game is played by your rules, even when you change them. Today you are the conquering force, the establishment and the bureaucracy all rolled into one. Who'd have predicted that a rebel like you would end up this way? But this isn't the end of the road. If you see yourself becoming the thing you hate, push off in the opposite direction. The best way to know your enemy is to become like them. Turn an open conflict into a subtle balancing.

zodiac.name: Pisces
zodiac.horoscope: You like tidy solutions under ideal conditions. Yes, and pigs will fly, too! But you could spend some time with airborne farm animals today as your vivid daydreams overlap your active, physical life. No one else can see these projections or illusions, so they'll probably wonder why you're flapping your arms as you soar with your imagination. And even if it isn't taking you to such silly places, this is going to be a solo flight. Involve others at your peril. They might not react well if you keep insisting on something they just don't get.
